dcterms:description: This collection includes a subset of 20 distinct signs in LIBRAS selected by a specialist. The signs were performed by 12 signers, each executing the same sign five times, resulting in a total of 1,158 video sequences.
dcterms:title: MINDS-Libras

dcterms:creator: L. R. Cerna

dcterms:description: This collection encompasses a subset of 56 distinct signs in LIBRAS performed by 5 signers, classified into categories based on movement similarity, articulation point, hand pose, and facial expression.
dcterms:title: LIBRAS-UFOP
